title: Finance students to teach money skills to Pawtucket elementary children as part of Financial Literacy Month - University of Rhode Island
content: Finance students to teach money skills to Pawtucket elementary children as part of Financial Literacy Month  University of Rhode Island
description: Five students from the College of Businessâ€™ Financial Management Association will visit M. Virginia Cunningham Elementary School in Pawtucket on Thursday, April 28, to teach a full day of classes on financial literacy to students as part of Financial Literacy Month.  ...
